summary.para: The type for specifying asymmetric cryptographic keys as a CryptoNG NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE.

When this structure is used in an API (such as with) and subsequent for a channel), the application is responsible for making sure that the NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE remains valid as long as the key is in use. The application is also responsible for freeing the handle when it is no longer in use.
This type is supported only on Windows Vista and later platforms.

member.name: WS_NCRYPT_ASYMMETRIC_SECURITY_KEY_HANDLE.keyHandle
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other key handle types derive.
